dict.string: Synai needs access to your camera to take photos for updating your cover photo. Without this access, you will not be able to update your cover photo using the camera.
Synai uses your location data continuously to display users near you, enhancing your social interactions and recommendations. If you deny this permission, nearby users will not be shown.
Synai requires access to your location to show you nearby users for a more personalized social experience. If you choose not to allow this, nearby users will not be displayed.
Synai needs microphone access to record and send audio messages. Without this permission, you won't be able to record and share audio messages.
Synai requires access to add new photos to your library, enabling you to save photos directly from the app.
Synai needs access to your photo library to select and update your cover photo. Without this permission, you won't be able to update your cover photo.
Synai uses device identifier information to enhance the security of your account transactions and provide personalized advertising services tailored to your preferences.
